revised_title: Improving Microscope Definition with the Aplanatic Searcher
tldr: The author, G. W. Royston-Pigott, develops the Aplanatic Searcher to improve high-power definition in the microscope. By adjusting the objective and eyepiece, the Aplanatic Searcher increases magnification and enhances image clarity, allowing for better comparison of known and unknown objects under high magnification.
